text: Commander Maria Christina Hill is a fictional character that appears in the universe of Marvel Comics, and is a supporting character in most of the Iron Man comics. She was created by Brian Michael Bendis and David Finch, and first appeared in New Avengers #4. == Fictional character biography == Hill is an agent (and later director) of S.H.I.E.L.D. She is also an ally of Nick Fury and the Avengers, mainly its prominent members, Iron Man and Captain America. == In other media == In the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) media franchise, the character is played by actress Cobie Smulders. Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Maria Hill
